function.name: redistributeStanfordRelationsAuxHave
function.example: eg Red dogs have flies. aux(flies-4, have-3) + nsubj(flies-4, dogs-2) + !obj(flies-4, x) -> obj(have-3, flies-4) + nsubj(have-3, dogs-2)

function.name: collapseRedundantRelationAndMakeNegativeStanford
function.example: eg The chicken has not eaten a pie.: neg(eaten-5, not-4)

function.name: redistributeStanfordRelationsDisableRedundantLogicalConditions
function.example: eg For all baskets in the house and apples in the tree, eat the pie. prep_for(eat[13], basket[3]) + prep_for(eat[13], apple[8]) + conj_and(baskets-3, apples-8) + !conj_and(apples-8, x) {disable prep_for(eat[13], apple[8])}

function.name: defineActionConcepts1
function.example: eg She can run to the park. aux(run-3, can-2))
